content: Extension of COBRA benefits for certain TAA-eligible individuals and PBGC recipients. ERISA Amendments to extend COBRA benefits for TAA-eligible individuals and PBGC recipients by adding special rules for disability and PBGC recipients in qualifying events. ERISA Amendments extend COBRA benefits for TAA-eligible individuals and PBGC recipients, with special rules for disability and PBGC recipients in qualifying events. The date of death of the covered employee determines the benefit payment timeline. The ERISA Amendments extend COBRA benefits for TAA-eligible individuals and PBGC recipients, with special rules for disability and PBGC recipients in qualifying events. For covered employees who are TAA-eligible individuals, the period of coverage shall not terminate before the specified date or when the individual ceases to be TAA-eligible. The ERISA Amendments extend COBRA benefits for TAA-eligible individuals and PBGC recipients, with special rules for disability and PBGC recipients in qualifying events.
